Product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Consumer complaint narrative: 7 years ago, someone hacked my credit and stole my identity posing as me but without my full legal name ... I have written to all 3 credit bureaus and repeatedly they have showen negligence in removing fraudulent items from my report. My initial letters, police report listing fraudulent items & FTC affidavit were mailed to them XXXX,2017. It has been over 45 days, the legal amount of time they have to investigate the items. The following items are still fraudulently being listed on my credit report under Experian and Transunion. No legally required notorized verification was provided to me showing that these items are mine nor proof from the lenders, which is required to be sent in the 1st 45 days of a dispute and then the bureaus must be sent to me with notorized proof they are mine. Neither of these have been done. I would like these items removed. See the following :

Consumer complaint narrative: I purchased a vehicle 3 years ago. As of recently I've made every payment on time. About a year ago I went through a separation from my children 's mother. For custody reasons she has gone out of her way to destroy my credit and career, in order to win custody of our children. She has cost me 2 jobs, by showing up and harassing me. I have evidence of this. She has opened 3 accounts in my name. If have no problem paying these if I could maintain a job. My vehicle was intentionally damaged. Sugar was poured into the gas tank. It caused over {$2000.00} in damage. She disputed 3 payments made through an account that she had used to pay with. She was listed as on the vehicle account as a driver, and on the auto insurance, which she also disputed 2 payments. After which she reported to the auto finance company the location of my vehicle and said to repo it. Then bragged about lying and what she had done one social media. I've since made the repairs using what saved money I have. I'm having troubles catching the vehicle up in order to use it as transportation to an from work. I'm a XXXX   XXXX, and can make money with or with out a job. It's just she to the personal attacks from this individual I'm currently in a circle of dept that has locked my ability to grasp how and what to do to overcome it. I need advise or help. Recently I made {$800.00} in payments to get the vehicle under 90 days past due. Toyota told me they would give me options after I did that, and vehicle would be taken out of repo status. They denyed my request to move the past due amount to the back of the dept like they agreed. Then sent a repo agent to claim the vehicle. I denyed then the vehicle. And will continue to do so. I've worked hard to buy, keep, maintain, and repair my vehicle. I'm still behind exactly what was disputed. I'm only weeks from fully financially collapsing and losing my home and everything. I've exhausted all my resources to stay afloat. This is my first attempt to ask for help. I need options. Please help.

Sub-issue: Right to dispute notice not received
Consumer complaint narrative: I monitor my credit report, more frequently now as we 're attempting to buy our first house. A collection notice was filed for the amount of {$3900.00}. We have received no notification of this debt, no verification of this debt, and consequently no notice of right to dispute this debt.

Representative from company continues to call after several requests from myself and spouse to quit calling. I have asked for a letter of proof of debt and who the owner of the debt is and never received it.   They tell us it is a federal student loan when in fact it is a private student loan and they are threatening " federal repercussions ''.   They have called my spouses employer several times and claimed to my wife that I gave permission to do so. I did not give permission nor do I know how to contact her employer.   I have asked to come to a reasonable payment agreement assuming such debt is actually owed and am continually asked to pay full amount as the only option.   I am tired of the oppressive calls which to my knowledge are breaking both federal and Indiana law.
